attributes.action: why is gordon so worried about CO2, when most of us are unemployed?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Shouldn't gordon brown be worrying about getting us back into employment, so we can afford to better insulate our homes etc, rather than telling us all about it when we are powerless to act..

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
